Your Tesla Account email and Passport are the details to enter below. This enables Control of the powerwall via the Action Group. This will enable Indigo to change battery backup reserve and alter mode of battery from backup, to discharging.. They are also used for a couple of Battery related States. If left blank, these states will be left blank and control won't be possible.
